meanings.definition: In a manner showing deep respect or admiration.
meanings.sent1: She looked at the painting reverentially, feeling a sense of awe.
meanings.sent2: The students listened reverentially to the wise old teacher.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail reverentially at the sight of its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled reverentially in the vast night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tree stood reverentially in the center of the peaceful garden.

meanings.sent1: The child gazed reverentially at the colorful fireworks in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The audience clapped reverentially after the moving performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred reverentially as it received a gentle scratch behind the ears.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed reverentially against the rocky shore, creating a mesmerizing sound.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak rose reverentially above the clouds, majestic and grand.
